required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Metabolic Availability of Lysine From Rice
clinical_study.official_title: Application of the Indicator Amino Acid Oxidation Technique for the Determination of Metabolic Availability of Lysine From Cooked Rice Protein in Adult Men

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the digestibility of the amino acid lysine in cooked rice in adult men using stable isotope technique.

detailed_description.textblock: The investigators objective is to determine the metabolic availability (MA) of lysine in cooked white rice protein using the indicator amino acid oxidation (IAAO) technique. Five men will receive graded levels (20, 40, and 60, and 70%) of the lysine requirement of 35 mg/kg/d as a crystalline AA mixture,and cooked rice protein (20, 40 and 60%), respectively.

primary_outcome.description: 3 breath samples will be taken to provide a baseline F13CO2 measurement (Level of phenylalanine oxidation). Breath samples will be collected and analyzed for 13CO2 enrichment.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 15 min after intake of the fourth hourly meal (before tracer infusion))
primary_outcome.description: 3 breath samples will be taken to provide a baseline F13CO2 measurement (Level of phenylalanine oxidation). Breath samples will be collected and analyzed for 13CO2 enrichment.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 min after intake of the fourth hourly meal (before tracer infusion))
primary_outcome.description: 3 breath samples will be taken to provide a baseline F13CO2 measurement (Level of phenylalanine oxidation). Breath samples will be collected and analyzed for 13CO2 enrichment.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 45 min after intake of the fourth hourly meal (before tracer infusion))
primary_outcome.description: 3 breath samples will be taken to provide a baseline F13CO2 measurement (Level of phenylalanine oxidation). Breath samples will be collected and analyzed for 13CO2 enrichment.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Post Tracer Infusion (between 150 and 240 min of tracer infusion)
secondary_outcome.description: 4 breath samples will be taken to provide F13CO2 measurement (Level of phenylalanine oxidation).Breath samples will be collected and analyzed for 13CO2 enrichment.

intervention.intervention_name: Amino Acid Crystalline Lysine Amino Acid Mix
intervention.description: crystalline lysine from AA MIX (20, 40, and 60% of the mean lysine requirement of 35 mg/kg/d) Lysine will be given in the form of L-Lysine-HCl, Sigma-Aldrich Brand.
Lysine (20,40 and 60 % of the mean lysine requirement) from Cooked Rice

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy Adult males (18 to 50years old)
Exclusion Criteria:
- A history of recent weight loss or illness
- Use of any medication at the time of entry into the study.

overall_official.affiliation: The Hospital for Sick Children, Toronto, Canada

responsible_party.investigator_title: Professor of Paediatrics and Nutritional Sciences (Emeritus) University of Toronto, Senior Scientist Research Institute,The Hospital for Sick Children
